trans-unit.target: Per questo evento non è necessario registrarsi.

trans-unit.source: Alas, this event has been canceled.
This event has no date yet.
trans-unit.target: La data di questo evento non è ancora stata decisa.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the registration period for this event is over.
trans-unit.target: Spiacente, il periodo utile per registrarsi a questo evento è scaduto.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, there are no more vancacies.
trans-unit.target: Spiacente, non ci sono posti liberi.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this number of seats cannot be reserved. Please reserve at most %s seats.

trans-unit.source: Sorry, this number of seats cannot be reserved. Please reserve at most %s seats.

thank you for registering for the waiting list of the event "%s"

trans-unit.source:
Hello,
someone just has registered for an event:

Ciao,
qualcuno si è appena iscritto all'evento:

trans-unit.source:
Hello,
someone just has unregistered from an event:

Ciao,
qualcuno ha appena cancellato la sua registrazione da un evento:

Hello,
someone just has registered for the waiting list of an event:

trans-unit.source: Registration became a regular registration notification

Hello,
someone's registration just has become a regular registration of an event:
trans-unit.target:
Ciao,
la registrazione di un partecipante è stata promossa a regolare per un evento:

trans-unit.source:
Hello %organizer,
the event "%event" (Event number: %uid) will take place in %days days. Currently, there are %registrations registrations for this event.
Cancelation deadline for "%event" has just passed

Hello %organizer,
the speakers' cancelation deadline for the event "%event" has just passed (Event number: %uid, begin date: %begin_date). Currently, the event is neither confirmed nor canceled and there are %registrations registrations for this event.
For this event to take place, a minimum number of registrations is needed. In case this number is not reached, the event will not take place. Of course, you then will be notified as soon as possible.
This tasks sends e-mail notifications, including reminders that an event will take place shortly or that the cancelation deadline is due.
UID of the page with the TypoScript configuration
Please enter the UID of an existing page.

%salutation
you registered for the event "%eventTitle" (%eventDate).
Unfortunately, we had to cancel this event.

%salutation
you registered for the event "%eventTitle" (%eventDate).
This event now has been confirmed.
Error 403. Sorry, you don't have access to this data.
trans-unit.target: Errore 403. Spiacente, non hai accesso a questa pagina.

trans-unit.source: Error 404. The requested page does not exist. If you get this error message using a link on this page, please notify the webmaster. Thank you!
trans-unit.target: Errore 404. La pagina richiesta non esiste. Sei pregato di contattare il webmaster e avvertirlo del problema. Grazie!

trans-unit.source: Error 404. There is no event with this number. If you get this error message using a link on this page, please notify the webmaster. Thank you!
trans-unit.target: Errore 404. Non c'è nessun evento con questo codice. Sei pregato di contattare il webmaster e avvertirlo del problema. Grazie!

trans-unit.source: The new record will be created in the folder: %s (UID %u)
The new record will be created in the current folder: %s (UID %u).

The single view page is not set. If this is not set, the link to the single view page cannot be sent in the cancelation emails. To fix this problem, please set plugin.tx_seminars_pi1.detailPID in the TS Setup of the current page.
Unfortunately, we had to cancel this event.
Please select a folder in the page tree.
No static template was found. Please include the seminars static template in the TS setup of this folder.
The e-mail to the attendees has been sent.
This module allows you to manage events, registrations, event sites and speakers.
trans-unit.target: Questo modulo gestisce eventi, registrazioni, luoghi degli eventi e oratori.
